ability.name: Synaptic Override
ability.flavor: You control an enemy's nervous system. How pleasant for them.

effect.t1: The target makes a free strike against one enemy of your choice.
effect.t2: The target shifts up to their speed and uses their signature ability against any enemies of your choice.
effect.t3: The target moves up to their speed and uses their signature ability against any enemies of your choice.

effects.effect: You control the target's movement. The target can't be moved in a way that would harm them (such as over a cliff), leave them dying, or result in them suffering a condition or other negative effect. However, you can move them to provoke opportunity attacks.
You take 1d6 damage and are weakened until the end of your turn.
